summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 CHEVROLET IMPALA.  WHILE DRIVING BETWEEN 1 AND 25 MPH, THE CONTACT HEARD A LOUD CLUNKING NOISE COMING FROM THE FRONT END OF THE VEHICLE.  HE ALSO FELT A VIBRATION IN THE STEERING WHEEL.  THERE IS A TECHNICAL SERVICE BULLETIN (01-02-32001H) REGARDING THIS SAME FAILURE.  THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THE CONTACT WOULD BE RESPONSIBLE FOR THE REPAIR COSTS.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 37,500 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 35,000.
